comic-files.confirm-start-message: Are you sure you want to import the {count, plural, =1{one comic} other{# comic files}} into the library?

load-comic-files.effect-success: Found {count, plural, =1{one comic file} other{# comic files}}.
load-comic-files.effect-failure: Failed to find any comic files.

comic-files.page-title: Import Comics: {selected, plural, =1{One} other{#}} Of {count, plural, =1{One Comic} other{# Comics}} Selected

send-comic-files.effect-failure: Failed to send comic files for import.
send-comic-files.effect-success: Submitted {count, plural, =1{one comic file} other{# comic files}} for import.

tooltip.delete-blocked-pages-off: Blocked pages will not be marked for deletion.
tooltip.delete-blocked-pages-on: Blocked pages will be marked for deletion.
tooltip.select-all: Select all comic files for import.
tooltip.start-import: Start importing the selected comic files.
tooltip.toggle-file-lookup-form: Toggle the comic file lookup form.
